summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 46th Avenue Northeast, from East 40th Street to East 38th Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Petition No. 107,434 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
